2063230.name: Doctor Nanobot
2063230.description:
The year is 20XX and nanobots have become a standard medical treatment. Enter Doctor Nanobot, the newest medical nanobot armed with the most advanced medical weaponry! Blast your foes with the Nanoblaster, vaporize them with the Photon Cannon, shred them with the Free Radical Machine Gun, annihilate them with the Antibody Gun and destroy them with the Mega Cannon! Viruses, bacteria and infected cells beware, medicine just got personal.

• 5 levels
• 5 upgradable weapons
• 5 difficulty levels from easy to extreme
• Many different enemies and bosses to fight
• A chiptune dance music soundtrack by Mike Rai
